item.title: Ride of a Lifetime by Bob Iger
item.description: This is seems to be a really good book! The book is about “nurturing the good and managing the bad” In this post I talk about: Why did I decide to listen to this book? What do I think I will learn from this book? My thoughts after listening the prologue Why did I decide to listen to this book? I heard about Bob Iger after reading an article that mentioned that the CEO of Disney was thinking of running for the president of the USA.
